title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of employees.
Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum Number of employees among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Number of employees was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
Among all the Worker Types, 2014 had the highest Number of employees in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest Number of employees in Worker Type Temporary workers.
There is a gap of 17800.0 between the highest and lowest Number of employees found for 2014 in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers.

Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum Number of employees among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Number of employees was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of employees.
Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum Number of employees among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Number of employees was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
Among all the Worker Types, 2014 had the highest Number of employees in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest Number of employees in Worker Type Temporary workers.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of employees.
Out of all 5 groups, 2015 had the highest Number of employees in Worker Type Regular workers and 2017 had the lowest Number of employees in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Among all the Worker Types, 2014 had the highest Number of employees in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest Number of employees in Worker Type Temporary workers.
The maximum Number of employees for 2014 that was found in Worker Type Regular workers was 4.87 times larger than the minimum Number of employees observed in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Out of all 5 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Number of employees was found in case of 2015.

In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest Number of employees 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest Number of employees 2800.0. The second highest Number of employees 20800.0 was observed for 2015 in Worker Type Regular workers.
Averaging all 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017, the Worker Type Regular workers is the maximum Number of employees and Temporary workers is the minimum Number of employees.
